/* CategoryMapper.xml, selectCategoryEbookComicList, SAC 전시, 서대영, SK 플래닛, 2014-07-16 */ SELECT LA.TOTAL_COUNT , LA.RNUM , LA.TOP_MENU_ID , LA.MENU_ID , LA.PROD_ID , ( SELECT PART_PROD_ID FROM ( SELECT Z1.PROD_ID ,Z1.PART_PROD_ID ,ROW_NUMBER( ) OVER ( PARTITION BY Z1.PROD_ID ORDER BY CASE WHEN Z2.BOOK_CLSF_CD = Z3.BOOK_CLSF_CD THEN 1 ELSE 2 END , Z3.CHAPTER DESC , NVL( Z4.USE_PERIOD_UNIT_CD, 'PD00310' ) DESC , Z4.LAST_DEPLOY_DT DESC ) AS RN FROM TB_DP_PROD_RSHP Z1 ,TB_DP_EBOOK_PROD Z2 /* 채널 상품 */ ,TB_DP_EBOOK_PROD Z3 /* 에피소드 상품 */ ,TB_DP_PROD Z4 /* 에피소드 상품 */ WHERE Z1.PROD_ID = Z2.PROD_ID AND Z1.PROD_RSHP_CD = 'DP010802' /* DP010802 : 채널-에피소드 상품 관계 */ AND Z1.PART_PROD_ID = Z3.PROD_ID AND Z1.PART_PROD_ID = Z4.PROD_ID ) Z WHERE Z.PROD_ID = LA.PROD_ID AND Z.RN = 1 ) AS PART_PROD_ID , LA.META_CLSF_CD , LA.CONTENTS_TYPE_CD FROM ( SELECT KA.* FROM ( SELECT JA.*,
ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY JA.LAST_DEPLOY_DT DESC, JA.PROD_NM) AS RNUM /* 최신순 */
ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY JA.PRCHS_CNT DESC, JA.PROD_NM) AS RNUM /* 다운로드순 */
ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY JA.PROD_AMT ASC, JA.PROD_NM) AS RNUM /* 낮은가격순 */
ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY JA.PROD_AMT DESC, JA.PROD_NM) AS RNUM /* 높은가격순 */
ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY JA.LAST_DEPLOY_DT DESC, JA.PROD_NM) AS RNUM /* 최신순(Default) */
FROM ( SELECT IA.*, COUNT(IA.PROD_ID) OVER() AS TOTAL_COUNT FROM ( SELECT A.TOP_MENU_ID , A.MENU_ID , D.PROD_ID , D.LAST_DEPLOY_DT , D.META_CLSF_CD , D.CONTENTS_TYPE_CD , F.PROD_NM , H.PROD_AMT /* 가격 */ , I.PRCHS_CNT /* 구매건수 */ FROM TB_DP_MENU_CATEGORY A , TB_DP_MENU_CATEGORY_PROD_MAPG B , TB_DP_PROD D /* 채널 상품 */ , TB_DP_EBOOK_PROD E /* 채널 상품 */ , TB_DP_PROD_DESC F /* 채널 상품 */ , TB_DP_TENANT_PROD G /* 채널 상품 */ , TB_DP_TENANT_PROD_PRICE H /* 채널 상품 */ , TB_DP_TENANT_PROD_STATS I WHERE B.MENU_ID = A.MENU_ID AND D.PROD_ID = B.PROD_ID AND E.PROD_ID = B.PROD_ID AND E.PROD_ID = D.PROD_ID AND F.PROD_ID = D.PROD_ID AND G.PROD_ID = D.PROD_ID AND G.TENANT_ID = #{tenantId} /* header param : tenantId */ AND H.PROD_ID = D.PROD_ID AND H.TENANT_ID = #{tenantId} /* header param : tenantId */ AND I.PROD_ID = D.PROD_ID AND I.TENANT_ID = #{tenantId} /* header param : tenantId */ AND SYSDATE BETWEEN H.APPLY_START_DT AND H.APPLY_END_DT AND A.USE_YN = 'Y' /* Y : 사용 (사용여부) */ AND B.USE_YN = 'Y' /* Y : 사용 (사용여부) */ AND D.SVC_GRP_CD = 'DP000203' /* DP000203 : 멀티미디어 */ AND D.CONTENTS_TYPE_CD = 'PD002501' /* PD002501 : 채널타입 */ AND F.LANG_CD = #{langCd} /* 언어 코드 */ AND G.PROD_STATUS_CD = 'PD000403' /* PD000403 : 판매중 */ AND G.EXPO_YN = 'Y' /* Y : 노출 (노출여부) */ AND A.TOP_MENU_ID = #{topMenuId} /* 탑메뉴ID */ AND D.TOP_MENU_ID = #{topMenuId} /* 탑메뉴ID */ AND A.MENU_ID = #{menuId} /* 메뉴ID */ AND B.MENU_ID = #{menuId} /* 메뉴ID */
AND D.PROD_GRD_CD IN
#{prodGradeCd}
AND E.COMPT_YN = 'Y'
AND (NVL(H.CHNL_UNLMT_AMT, -1) > 0 OR NVL(H.CHNL_PERIOD_AMT, -1) > 0) /* 유료 상품 */
AND (NVL(H.CHNL_UNLMT_AMT, -1) <= 0 AND NVL(H.CHNL_PERIOD_AMT, -1) <= 0) /* 무료 상품 */
AND EXISTS (SELECT 'X' FROM TB_DP_PROD_RSHP I ,TB_DP_SPRT_DEVICE L ,TB_CM_DEVICE M WHERE I.PROD_ID = B.PROD_ID AND I.PART_PROD_ID = L.PROD_ID AND L.DEVICE_MODEL_CD = M.DEVICE_MODEL_CD AND I.PROD_RSHP_CD = 'DP010802' /* DP010802 : 채널-에피소드 상품 관계 */ AND L.DEVICE_MODEL_CD IN (#{deviceModelCd}, 'ANY-PHONE-4MM') AND M.USE_YN = 'Y' ) ) IA ) JA ) KA WHERE KA.RNUM BETWEEN #{offset} AND #{count} ) LA
